what makes you think people give a rats ass what youre doing/not doing every second of the day? i mean, am I the only one that just doesnt give a flying rats ass??

im just beyond boggled that people ACTUALLY do this and are so into it? 
are people seriously that Pretentious?

dont
get
it
 
i think people should communicate to each other, and not <u>always</u> use stupid websites to do it...it reminds me of the movie "idiocracy" LOL seriously! i had NO idea wanting the world to know your every move/what others say to you is soo important..? when did the world get so full of themselves?! ASHTON KUTCHER USING FUCKING BILBOARDS ON THE FREEWAY TO ADVERTISE HIS MOTHER FUCKING TWITTER?!!!! REALLy?!! am i the only one who finds that to be just a tad obnoxious? douchey?!

sorry guys i just dont understand? 

maybe i have so much animosity to it because its being shoved down my throat so much, with the retard celebs and people too busy typing away on their phones instead of looking at me and talking to me like a person..OH SORRY TO INTERRUPT!! ..i refuse to join that band wagon..whatever though

sorry..

what it really feels and means to be in love, with someone so selfless and big hearted...someome who can make it all better just by kissing your forehead, and looking ino your eyes with all the adoration in the world

a couple weeks ago, he took me the scenic route to the santa monica peir, because i had never seen it. we spent a really sweet night walking the boardwalk and enjoying the crisp winter night. my heart cannot put into words how special he makes me feel...all the time.

this weekend we spent a hilarious funny amazing time in vegas. from start to finish it was just one crazy adventure after the next. drinking yard margaritas in the tub filled with bubbles, strip clubs, beatles show, making fun of how crappy and repative pop music has become and missing the way it used to be..trying to go see donny and marie..up until getting home when i realized the baggage man left my fucking MAC makeup case...i was fucking flipping out, ALL my make up, ALLLLL of it, mac and all, my brushes...my JEWLERY that my mom and of course David got me were all in the fucking case. not only that, but if a chick was to see a mac case just sitting there with no one around, consider that shit STOLEN. i couldnt believe that, how i just let him take care of that case KNOWING it wouldnt be a good idea. i was loosing my shit, thats a lot of money and make up just GONE. G-O-N-E! of course david blamed homself and i told him it wasnt, so we call the hotel and told them to call us if they found it. i was beyond upset...my jelwery that i cant get back, just fucking gone. i came in my room to unpack and david leaves and comes back to my house about 15 minutes later with MONEY! TWO HUNDRED DOLLARS!!! he was planning on buying me my make up back. of course i could/would never accecpt that, but the mere thought of him trying to help me blew me away. it just made me cry more at his generosity. i could never take his money but shit...who does that? for ME? he called the hotel back and they said that it was left on the luggage cart, and that they had it there. THANK FUCKING GOD!!!!  hopefully they mail it back to me with EVERYTHING in that damn case..

seriously, im a lucky girl....in so so many ways

so last friday, after a long fun day at universal, we decided to go hang out downtown in hollywood,in which we mossied down to JImmy Kimmel for the hell of it, of course David was able to shinnanigan our way backstage with ease. we hung out in the kick ass green room, ate catered food, watched the plasma tvs, drank free booze, rubbed elbows with william shatner, and walked to the side of the stage to watch Ludacris..LOL....we were litterally ON The stage side, laughing like morons. MOOOOVE BITCH! GET OUT THE WAY! thats all we knew,AHAAH!! anywhoo, i sat on the head rest of kimmels side stage lounge chair while he was sitting in it..so after MOOOVE BITCH was over, david called to jimmy) who greeted us with a smile, and david told him i was some broad from the Howard Stern show (who kimmel was a fan of) to which he lit up and said, "HOLY SHIT!!! wow!" david milked it, i played along...kimmel was SO FUCKING NICE, SO NICE! to which he was nice enough to do this so after that, we went to the roosevelt hotel got drunk, david got WASTED which lead to dancing naked with the homeless dollhouse man before we went in for acdc the security guy looked at me and said what sounded like "watch out for her, shes in a gang!" i was like HUH?!! WTF are you talking about?! im not in a gang! to which he replied "NO! DANITY KANE!" me "HUH?!" him "AUBREY!" to which the rest of the security had to come stare at me and i felt like he was calling me trashy, to which they said "its a good thing" LOL! so i was invited to her wedding, her wedding to a person shes known for less than a year i didnt go now looking at her pictures, how cute she looked, how happy she looked i feel like an ass but seriously, who would go to their ex's wedding, or someone who you were in a relationship with, shared things with. loved...still love and will always have that place in my heart, she meant a lot to me, and i didnt feel like it would be right for me to go, i just didnt want to. now, thinking about it, i should have, for her. just to support her, like she would have done for me. i havent heard from her since...nobody really understands what im feeling about this, its just..crappy. we are really good friends still, but at the same time i couldnt sit there and watch her get married. i dunno. yet i feel bad i didnt. now i wish i was there, life is too short for selfish agendas she was a huge part of a portion of my life, in the role she played and even though i feel like i need to justify my regrets, i dont. im not wrong for not going, and im not wrong for feeling bad that i didnt go so im stuck in the middle of the shitty in the middle feeling even though i know she was longing for someone to love and last i just dont feel i agree with that being the reason for rushing into marriage, who knows, maybe she really is happy, regardless of how it turns out, ill always be there for her from now on

so im angry at myself....i was given a second chance...to say goodbye i wasnt able to say goodbye to Monira, but i realized it wasnt too late to say goodbye to terry, even though i was happy with my last memory of us together,seeing him happy, smile...laughing...playing around with me....and for my own selfish needs i didnt want my last memory of seeing him dying, sick....not the terry i loved and looked at as a dad, i didnt want to see him like that...my teacher. the person who stood up for me EVERY Time..even if it got him in trouble...the person who shared his dreams with me, the things he held so close...he helped me perfect my drawings, and was always there to boost my self esteem when i needed it most, he was there by my side after my car accident and took me out when i was crippled...and look what the fuck i did i realized i HAD a chance, to say goodbye to him, AND her, the right way..to get over that guilt of not telling her goodbye too..i would do it for them. and myself. and after a heavy night of drinking, and crying, and thinking i made the final descion to go to him, be by his side...kiss his hand and comfort him....knowing it would make everything right, it was what i needed to do only i was too late...by a matter of hours...hes gone and i fucking blew it, now ill have that sitting on my conscience for the rest of my life like monira...i was too fucking selfish and it cost me my last chance... im so furious at myself, im so fucking angry and sick of people telling me what im feeling is wrong, when they dont fucking KNOW what it meant to me..... what a fucking scumbag, how could i of let that happen... and to hear your last words were to promise to tell me thank you for everything... :[ FUCKING KNIFE IF MY HEART and i let you down im so sorry terry, im so so sorry, i will never forgive myself, but i know you have...you meant the fucking world to me and im going to take everything you taught me and pass it on the those i encounter in life...im sorry..im so fucking sorry

i dont know what it is exatcly that i miss so much, our friendship, or that time in my life, that ENTIRE time i didnt expect to end as abruptlty i find myself missing her a lot, knowing that we could never ever be what we once were i miss all of it, i miss how it felt to be with her and how special we were that feeling of love a type that i cant really word or describe, and it breaks my heart so much that its one that was only meant to be felt once, only in that specefic period of my life nobody understood me or looked at me the way she did it was too good to last forever, yet i know it could have if she would have just balanced her new life with the one we shared togeher moments that were so incredible..emotional and intense that will never be forgotten, in my heart at least i couldnt imagine myself caring or loving someone the same way, ever you chose to let it fall away, that you couldnt find a way to share your life..you chose to leave me, like an old doll that you didnt need around anymore, one that sat and stayed loyal to you until my button eyes slowly started to unravel until i could no longer see you..that things never really ended just...went away...slipped away i couldnt hold on any longer yet i still wonder what you have made of yourself, and hope you are just as happy if not happier than the time we shared. that life is everything you ever dreamed it would be and that youre out there smiling...and that hes good to you i miss you so much, i just wish you knew, i wish you knew how much i will always care and love you always ...always

okay this is going to sound strange and unusual, that im jealous, and get mentaly/pyshically ill over a dead person

let me explain

so david's ex girlfriend died a couple years ago in a car accident(him and i were already together), im not sure if it was before or after Monira but i remember being weirded out by it then, and that i didnt have much sympothy

cruel? well, she cheated on David with his COUSIN, in HIS house and that was that, he always told me before she passed away that she was clingy, and didnt have any drive, but she was a good person blah blah blah(i also remember my friend sarah and i clobbering her at Chain shows when she would wear open toed heels in the pit and had the nerve to whine and complain that people were stepping on her, needless to say that we made SURE we stepped/trampled/hit ALL OVER That dumb bitch, this is BEFORE i knew who she was, BEFORE I was told she was Davids girlfriend) ANYWHOO afetr she and him broke up, the broad hooks up with Dallas! yes, suburban Legends Dallas, to make him mad.

okay 1: cheating is NOT okay, cheating in your house does NOT make you a good person, hooking up with your friend out of spite makes you repulsive! am i right?! or am i right?!

he tells me that he was destroyed over it when she did it and he didnt let himself get close to anyone for a couple years, until i came along
then after she dies, which by the way he tells me he was over her before hand, he didnt love her but was hurt that someone could do that to him. He tells me that he regrets not setting things right with her, just as a "hey we're cool" type thing, he'll say that "its something that i will never get past" granted when i tell him about all my GENUINE regrets and things i never got around to say to my MOnira he comes back at me with that shit, okay, monira NEVER did anything like that to me, all she did was love me and gave me one of the best friendships that i will treasure forever,  and i feel like when he brings up his ex at times like these i want to punch him. i know his feelings are justifiable yet at the same time, how in the hell am i supposed to take that??! how do i repsond to that?! 
like tonight, we were talking about my family situation with my brother and his wife, and he was compairing it to how his mother promised not to meddle in his love life after his ex, he told me that after she cheated he told his mom and she called her a SLUT!(lol)knowing she was just saying it to make her son feel better..and david got mad at her! explaining that he couldnt get past his mom calling her that if they were to ever get back together, SEERIOUSLY, WHAT THE FUCK?! 

i just dont know, i feel like this person that doesnt exsists anymore has this..i dont know, power over me, and always will..it fucking bothers me, like as lame as this sounds but how the hell am i supposed to compete with a dead person?!!!
OH! OH! and when we talk about going to SL shows, i tell him i wouldnt know what i would do if i saw Chris and his wife, that im ready to put it all behind and just say hi or something but that im scared to...he freaken tells me, "well at least you still can make ammends, i will never get to" SERIOUSLY?! i dont know why i let myself get all worked up over it, that someone that is gone still has that...its a very weird feeling, and im confused to what i should and shouldnt feel. 
because im insecure and its something that i cant change, its the weirdest fucking feeling, im jealous of a dead person, when he brings it up it makes me cringe and want to throw up, i just get so upset, if she were still alive, like, what would he have done differently? when we were in our relationship and she was still alive would he dwell so much? why am i doing this to myself? whats the point? all these crazy ass scenarios and shit come up that drive me nuts!
idont know how to approach it to him, i know that he is intitled to his feelings but at the same time, i dont dwell on chris(anymore) to him, its done! i feel selfish but it does make me feel like shit sometimes, that her actions would still let him get mad at his mom for calling her cheating ass a slut, SHE WAS! 

UGGGHHHHH i dont know, it drives me crazy sometimes, and i dont know how to not let it get to me, i know he loves me and that doesnt scare me, but i dont know, this dead girl will always be lingering and it kills me

loving someone so incredibly much sometimes has its hang ups
like having a hard day and just wanting to fall asleep with him, holding me
or having one of my god awful nightmares and waking up franticly reaching for him only to realize hes not there to protect me and help me fall back asleep
missing him so much throughout the week and just wanting to see him when i walk through the door
